author: Greg Kiar <gkiar.github.io>
description: Adds 1-voxel noise to a Nifti image at either a provided or random location within a mask.

inputs.description: Nifti image to be injected with one-voxel noise. Default behaviour is that this will be done at a random location within an image mask.
inputs.name: image_file

inputs.description: Nifti image containing a binary mask for the input image. The noise location will be selected randomly within this mask, unless a location is provided.
inputs.name: mask_file

inputs.description: Path for where the resulting Nifti image with one voxel noise will be stored.
inputs.name: output_directory

inputs.description: Dictates the way in which noise is aplpied to the image. If not set, the value specified with the intensity flag will be set to the new value. If set, the intensity value will be multiplied by the original image value at the target location.
inputs.name: scale

inputs.description: The intensity of the noise to be injected in the image. Default value is 0.01 so specifying the scale flag alone will result in a 1%% intensity change at the target location.
inputs.name: intensity

inputs.description: Value dictating how much to erode the binary mask before selecting a location for noise. The default value assumes a slightly generous mask.
inputs.name: erode

inputs.description: Specifies a target location for injecting noise. This location must live within the provided mask in voxel coordinates. If not provided, a random location within the mask will be used.
inputs.name: location

inputs.description: Disables checks and restrictions on noise that may be not recommended for a typical workflow. By default, locations can only be specified within the mask, but this overrides that behaviour.
inputs.name: force

inputs.description: Determines where noise will be injected in the case of higher-dimensional images than masks. 'Single' (default) will choose a single position in all higher dimensions, resulting in 1 point of noise. 'Uniform' will choose a location within the mask and apply it uniformly across all other dimensions. 'Independent' will generate a random location within the mask for each volume in the remaining dimensions, and is mutually exclusive with providing a location.
inputs.name: mode

inputs.description: Toggles creation of a Boutiques descriptor and invocation from the tool and inputs.
inputs.name: boutiques

name: oneVoxel
